title: [2.0.9.2版本]英文合成表
author: sjjklh
txt_content:
复制粘贴自http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=283802297
                          

Supplies
1 Log creates 4 Board.
1 Board using Handsaw creates 4 Stick.
1 Scrap Metal creates 2 Nails.
1 Scrap Metal over a fire creates 2 Bolts.
2 Stick using Pocketknife creates 1 Wooden Spike.
1 Branch creates 3 Stick.
1 Rocks creates 3 Stone.
2 Stone over a fire creates 1 Scrap Metal.
1 Animal Pants creates 1 Animal Pelt.
1 scrap using handsaw = 3 wire
1 cloth using handsaw = 3 rope
1 rope + 1 cloth = 3 fertilizer

Components
2 boards create 1 Wooden Plate.
2 Stick create 1 Wooden Support.
2 Wooden Plate create 1 Wooden Frame.
2 Wooden Support create 1 Wooden Cross.
2 Stone create 1 Stone Plate.
1 Stone with 1 Board creates 1 Stone Support.
2 Stone Plates create 1 Stone Frame.
2 Stone Supports create 1 Stone Cross.

Barricades
3 Board with 1 Nails creates 1 Wooden Shield.
1 Wooden Frame with 1 Bolts creates 1 Wooden Door.
2 Nails creates 1 Caltrop.
2 Wire creates 1 Barbed Wire.
1 Wooden Door with 1 Bolts creates 1 Wooden Shutter.
2 Sticks with 2 bolts creates 1 Brazier
4 Scrap Metal with 2 Bolts creates 1 Metal Shield (requires level 2 Craftsman).

Storage
2 Wooden Frame with 3 Wooden Cross creates 1 Crate (requires level 1 Craftsman).
1 Crate with 3 Scrap metal creates 1 Metal Locker (requires level 2 Craftsman skill).
1 Crate with 3 Wooden Cross creates 1 Chest (requires level 2 Craftsman skill).

Structures
3 Wooden Frame creates 1 Wooden Foundation.
2 Wooden Frame with 2 Wooden Pillar creates 1 Wooden Wall.
1 Wooden Wall with 1 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Doorway.
2 Wooden Support with 1 Board creates 1 Wooden Pillar.
4 Wooden Plate with 1 Wooden Cross creates 1 Wooden Platform.
1 Wooden Platform with 2 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Ramp.
1 Wooden Foundation with 4 Fertilizer creates 1 Greenhouse Foundation.
1 Wooden Platform with 4 Fertilizer creates 1 Greenhouse Platform.
1 Wooden Platform with 1 Wooden Frame creates 1 Wooden Hole.
12 Stick with 1 Duct Tape creates 1 Wooden Ladder.
1 Wooden Doorway with 1 Wooden Support creates 1 Wooden Window.
1 Wooden Pillar creates 2 Wooden Post.
1 Wooden Wall creates 2 Wooden Rampart.
1 window + 1 support = 1 garage port
2 shutters + 2 bolts = garage door
1 Stone Wall creates 2 Stone Rampart (requires level 1 Craftsman).
1 Stone Pillar creates 2 Stone Post (requires level 1 Craftsman).
2 Stone Frame with 2 Stone Pillar creates 1 Stone Wall (requires level 1 Craftsman).
1 Stone Wall with 1 Stone Support creates 1 Stone Doorway (requires level 1 Craftsman).
1 Stone Doorway with 1 Stone Support creates 1 Stone Window (requires level 1 Craftsman).
2 Stone Support with 1 Board with level 1 crafting creates 1 Stone Pillar (requires level 1 Craftsman).
1 Wooden Door with 3 Scrap Metal creates 1 Metal Door. (requires level 2 Craftsman).

Clothes
4 Animal Pelt creates 1 Animal Shirt.
3 Animal Pelt with 1 Rope creates 1 Animal Pants.
4 Animal Pelt with 1 Duct Tape creates 1 Animalpack.
1 Fancy Suit creates 2 Cloth.
1 RCMP Uniform creates 2 Cloth.
1 Police Uniform creates 2 Cloth.
1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.
1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.
1 Doctor Coat creates 2 Cloth.
1 Orange Hoodie creates 2 Cloth.
1 Pink Shirt creates 1 Cloth.
1 Boring Suit creates 2 Cloth.
1 Blue Sweatervest creates 1 Cloth.
1 Jumper Top creates 2 Cloth.
1 Grocer Top creates 2 Cloth.
1 Sailor Fatigues creates 1 Cloth.
1 Plaid Shirt creates 2 Cloth.
1 Chef Shirt creates 2 Cloth.
1 Fancy Jeans creates 2 Cloth.
1 RCMP Uniform creates 2 Cloth.
1 Police Uniform creates 2 Cloth.
1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.
1 Army Fatigues creates 2 Cloth.
1 Work Jeans creates 2 Cloth.
1 Doctor Pants creates 2 Cloth.
1 Grey Pants creates 2 Cloth.
1 Khaki Pants creates 1 Cloth.
1 Boring Pants creates 2 Cloth.
1 Brown Pants creates 1 Cloth.
1 Jumper Bottom creates 2 Cloth.
1 Grocer Bottom creates 2 Cloth.
1 Sailor Fatigues creates 1 Cloth.
1 Lumberjack Pants creates 2 Cloth.
1 Chef Pants creates 2 Cloth.

Medical
2 Cloth creates 1 Rag.
1 Scrap Metal with 2 Stick creates 1 Splint.
2 Red Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Red Berries.
2 Blue Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Blue Berries.
2 Pink Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Pink Berries.
2 Pale Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Pale Berries.
2 Green Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Green Berries.
2 Purple Berries using Stone creates 1 Crushed Purple Berries.

Water
1 Moldy Bottled Water with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Bottled Water.
1 Moldy Milk with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Milk.
1 Moldy Orange Juice with 1 Purification Tablets creates 1 Orange Juice.

Food
1 Raw Venison over a fire creates 1 Cooked Venison.
1 Raw Bacon over a fire creates 1 Cooked Bacon.
survival stuff to make
7 Cloth with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Sleeping Bag.
8 Cloth with 5 Scrap Metal creates 1 Cot.
4 Stick with 4 Stone creates 1 Campfire.

Farming
1 Fresh Carrot creates 2 Carrot Seed.
1 Moldy Carrot creates 1 Carrot Seed.
1 Fresh Tomato creates 2 Tomato Seed.
1 Moldy Tomato creates 1 Tomato Seed.
1 Fresh Corn creates 2 Corn Seed.
1 Moldy Corn creates 1 Corn Seed.
1 Fresh Cabbage creates 2 Cabbage Seed.
1 Moldy Cabbage creates 1 Cabbage Seed.
1 Fresh Potato creates 2 Potato Seed.
1 Moldy Potato creates 1 Potato Seed.

Traps
3 Raw Explosives with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 MOAB (requires level 2 Craftsman).
2 Raw Explosives with 4 Wire creates 1 Tripmine (requires level 2 Craftsman).
2 Raw Explosives with 1 Can creates 1 Landmine (requires level 2 Craftsman)
4 Wooden Spike creates 1 Wooden Spike Trap.
1 Can with 2 Scrap Metal creates 1 Snare.
3 Scrap Metal with 2 Wire creates 1 Electric Trap.

Ammunition
2 Military Bullets with 1 NATO Magazine creates 1 NATO Magazine.
4 Military Bullets with 1 NATO Drum creates 1 NATO Drum.
1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Swift Magazine creates 1 Swift Magazine.
1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Bonjour Clip creates 1 Bonjour Clip.
1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Lebel Magazine creates 1 Lebel Magazine.
2 Tracer Bullets with 1 NATO Tracer creates 1 NATO Tracer.
2 Civilian Bullets with 1 Savage Magazine creates 1 Savage Magazine.
4 Civilian Bullets with 1 Savage Drum creates 1 Savage Drum.
1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Winchester Clip creates 1 Winchester Clip.
1 Military Bullets with 1 Lapua Magazine creates 1 Lapua Magazine.
1 Tracer Bullets with 1 Lapua Tracer creates 1 Lapua Tracer.
2 Civilian Bullets with 1 Yuri Magazine creates 1 Yuri Magazine.
1 Civilian Bullets with 1 Xtrmin Magazine creates 1 Xtrmin Magazine.
1 Stick with 1 Nails creates 3 Arrow.
1 Shells with 2 Nails creates 6 Buckshot.
1 Shells with 2 Bolts creates 6 Slug.

Attachments
1 Handlamp with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Tactical Light.
2 Canned Cola with 2 Can over a fire creates 1 Muffler.
1 Binoculars with 2 Duct Tape creates 1 Zoomomatic.

Gear
1 Batteries with 2 Scrap Metal creates 1 Handlamp.
3 Wooden Support with 2 Rope creates 1 Longbow.
1 Can with 1 Bottled Water creates 1 Canteen.
3 Nails with 1 Raw Explosives with level 2 crafting creates 1 Frag Grenade.
1 Sledgehammer with 4 Scrap Metal creates 1 Car Jack.
1 pelt + 1 can = 2 ducttape

Unturned-Bunker
Credit goes to Unturned-Bunker for there fantastic job

replies.author: Fate狩逅
replies.txt_content: 虽然 有中文的 但为什么没人回复啊？

replies.author: cheng000
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 cheng000 于 2014-7-14 00:19 编辑 
Fate狩逅 发表于 2014-7-13 23:42
虽然 有中文的 但为什么没人回复啊？
因为这玩看不懂，没有什么论点......大多数人想看中文的
